## WebsocketTransportConfig type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type WebsocketTransportConfig = {
    endpoint: string;
    query?: Record<string, string | number | boolean | null | undefined>;
    protocols?: string[];
    autoReconnect?: boolean;
    reconnectDelayMs?: number;
};
```
